review: Let's face it... there's so many different boxes like this out there, that Amazon really didn't have too much to innovate. I purchased this box for my mother and for her purposes, it has worked out great. She actually likes her Chromecast and FireTV. The only two cons I can name are:1. Does not have Google Play (Obviously), but it would be 100% better with it. Way more app options.2. Search feature only searched Amazon and that's pretty useless with a device like this.If you don't have an Amazon Prime account, then I would select something else; otherwise, this FireTV is pretty rockin' and easy to use (Mom is 70).
author: Michael LaPan

author: paul mcmann

review: I had a Roku for a bit over a year - it started locking up all the time so I was looking for a replacement - decided to go with the Amazon Fire TV.  There is a lot to love about it.  It is fast - the video streaming is great - the remote is great.  I have the game controller ordered (on back order)The reason for four stars vs five is that there are a few things missing - it will depend on what Amazon does with it.  There is no DLNA support.  There is a USB port on the device - but zero support for it.  These are two features of the Roku that I used to use a lot.  Hopefully Amazon will rectify these omissions in a update.I would hope that we see a flood of new apps in the near future as developers get on-board.  If the app selection grows and the omissions are fixed - this could easily get a 5 plus star review.

review: As soon as I saw this, knew that I had to have it!  It is small and super easy to set up.  I am a homebound, handicapped person, who  relies solely on home entertainment.  I must also rely on someone to set things up for me.  I was able to instruct a friend, who is not a techie, how to set things up for me with the Fire from Amazon.  She was able to do this in no time!  I was able to watch the latest movies that were Academy award winners or award nominees and stream from Amazon prime many others immediately that weekend at no additional cost!  I had ordered movies from Amazon many times before, however, this just makes the entire process so much easier!  Thanks Amazon for another big winner!
